file_content.text: You all right over there?
Don't know. Can't feel my fingers.
My fault. I tried to resist, but Vaylin... did things. She made me talk. I'm sorry.
Quantum bomb?
Long story, Len.
The only way we're alive is if they didn't use the console. What stopped them?
Listen carefully. Time is short.
Shorter than you think, droid.
You're scrap, SCORPIO.
I expect better from you than petty insults.
I manipulated Vaylin to leave the bridge so you could disarm your fail-safe.
You knew about that?
I share your desire to save the Gravestone. Stand by...
Vaylin has cornered Lana Beniko. You may wish to save her, too.
I came to kill you and Vaylin--and take back the Gravestone.
I'm here to kill, not save.
Your focus is too narrow. Koth will understand.
Oh, no... Vaylin and Lana are fighting where I hid the bomb. If they trigger it, we're all dead!
We're alive. Took you long enough.
I disabled the bomb fuse, but the bridge controls were already unlocked.
Koth deserves the blame. He got you into this mess.
Blame Koth.
Quantum bomb?
Get everyone to the escape pods.
No more games. We're not falling for your tricks again.
I won't be fooled again.
My deception is keeping you alive.
Why are you suddenly helping us?
You have an ulterior motive.
This vessel is the key to everything.
It doesn't make sense. They should've triggered the quantum bomb and killed us all.
You must have an excellent reason to show your face.
This is going to be good.
We won't leave her to face Vaylin alone.
Tell us where they are.
I have done all I can.
We have the same objective.
A fool like you never stood a chance against Vaylin.
You're useless.
Don't blame yourself. I got you into this.
Consider yourself lucky to be alive.
Vaylin has a way with people.
It's true. What she did is on me.
Lucky. Yeah...
Vaylin and SCORPIO were supposed to be here.
Where is she?
They went off to hunt you.
